page.title: 12ST. MARY'S R.C. CHURCH
page.content: The present church in Back Bongate was built in 1937.It is a Grade C listed building designed by Reginald Fairley ,and it seats 180 people.The outside is white and smooth-harled with Ballachulish slate on the roof. There are plans to build an extension at the rear to be a Committee Room.Inside,the plaster walls are painted white,and the ceiling is green.There are four statues. Since February 1982,the priest has been Father Conway,helped by Sister Antonia of the Loreto Sisters who live at Eden House in Lanton Rd.Sister Antonia visits the local schools to give Catholic teaching. There are two Sunday Services at 9a.m and 11.10a.m.and there is also a Service each day.There are about 300 members,about 70 of them children of school age.
